timeline.message:
Merge pull request #4833 from Zastai/JENKINS-62723

(cherry picked from commit f7ae11e6306935d0f3a4fdc0d0861c3b879304e9)

[JENKINS-62695] - Use daemon threads for SCMTrigger so Jenkins shuts down gracefully. (#4805)

(cherry picked from commit c732bb3693ab85413c204b4b1632935bbaa7e6fd)

timeline.bodyText: Too risky for LTS. #4880 (comment) represents a more conservative fix.
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText:
For LTS is either backport or not. I am uneasy to incorporate suggested fix that was never merged, released, tested.
Are there other downsides of backporting this except for https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-63222?
replies.author: olivergondza

replies.bodyText: I agree with Jesse. This isn't a clear improvement. Would leave it as is for this release (and consider expediting and backporting into next.1 the fix proposed by Jesse).
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: I agree, better to not backport it
replies.author: oleg-nenashev

timeline.message:
